xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/276084-Cooper Temple Clause: Blind Pilots 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Music & Musicals, Modern & Alternative Rock, Rock & Pop - Originally packaged with Cooper Temple Clause's 2003 "Kick Up a Fire and Let the Flames Break Loose" album, this brief release shines a spotlight on the band's "Blind Pilots" video, which chronicles a stag party gone wrong -- very, very wrong. Extras include a 15-minute "making of" featurette about the creation of the "Blind Pilots" video, which finds a man turning into the goat god Pan, as well as clips from the video's X-rated version. Cooper Temple Clause: Blind Pilots
